review: So....3 stars, but let me explain. The quality, ease, features of the Fire TV stick are wonderful. I COULD really enjoy streaming media devices, and this one experience certainly would not make me want to change to any other device. However, in my research, no one could tell me how much data would actually be used. I decided to risk $35 just to see if I could offset the way overpriced SAT services. On arrival, set up was easy, plug and play. I went to the Prime movies (free) and found a really good one. I checked my data usage before and after the movie. What i have determined FOR ME, is that you use just about 3GB of data per hour. ONLY if you have unlimited data would this be good or you will be paying a provider premium dollars for all the overage you will encounter, and quickly.Had i known the data usage, I probably would not have ordered, but that is the only reason to be careful. Just passing data use along.

author: Cameron Beattie

review: This is the best thing I bought all year!!!! Easy to use. The Amazon Fire Stick is so portable that it can be packed in you purse, suitcase or backpack while traveling. Just plug the stick in the wall and TV and you are watching movies quick and fast. I hated using other streaming devices because they did not work like a regular remote. This is so easy because all you have to do is start your remote and off you go. Amazon has hit a home run in my book! I wish I had bought more when it first came out, but I will be getting more soon. These would make a great gift to anyone who streams movies. Remember you can stream more than Amazon Prime, it works with Netflix and so on. If you don't have one of these you need to buy one if you love to watch movies and want the easiest option for streaming.
